original_text: That is how I will stop the people of this land from doing disgusting things. All the women will see what has happened to Oholah and Oholibah. They will not do the same disgusting things themselves. That is how I will stop the people of this land from doing disgusting things. All the women will see what has happened to Oholah and Oholibah. They will not do the same disgusting things themselves.
korean_text: 이같이 내가 이 땅에서 음란을 그치게 한즉 모든 여인이 정신이 깨어 너희 음행을 본받지 아니하리라

sentences.original_text: That is how I will stop the people of this land
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 내가 이 땅의 백성들을 막는 방법입니다

sentences.original_text: what has happened to Oholah and Oholibah
They will not do the same disgusting things themselves
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 스스로 동일한 혐오스러운 일들을 하지 않을 것입니다
